original_text: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.
korean_text: 그 속죄제물의 머리에 안수하고 그 제물을 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall lay his hand
upon the head of the sin offering,
in the place of the burnt offering.
